(In reply to comment #2)
> Please reopen with the requested information.
> 
Concerning your request I detect that the Agent Controller service was startet. I stopped it to use the Integrated Controller and then there was no more Problems with the Attachments.

Thank you for your help.

I will analyse later, why there are Problems with the excluded Agent Controller Service.

Friendly Regards, Krista Haldenwang

(In reply to comment #3)

Thanks Krista.  

I was hoping for the reverse since defect https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=173136 would explain the problem.

I would to investigate further so when you have the time, can you provide the TPTP version/build with the JRE you are using for the Agent Controller service.

Thanks.
Reporter: Please verify and close in preparation for shutting down the TPTP 4.4 release.  Thanks.
